title: KEY ORGANIZERS
description: The Key Organizers are responsible for developing and executing the vision and mission of the Hackathon. They provide strategic direction, and each appointed director offers operational management to its respective department. Organizing team members collaborate closely with each department head to ensure objective alignment and drive member performance. The team is also in-charge of representing the organization to external partners.

title: IT TEAM
description: The IT Department is primarily in-charge of designing, coding, modifying, and maintaining the hackathon’s official website such as layout, functionality, and user experience. They are also responsible for integrating relevant website content through constant collaboration with other departments.

title: PARTNER EXPERIENCE TEAM
description: The Partner Experience Department ensures that key stakeholders have positive experience in collaborating with Seneca Hackathon, while building strong and nurturing relationships. They develop challenge categories, working closely with our partner institutions to understand their objectives and translate them into clear and meaningful challenge sets for the participants.

title: STUDENT SUCCESS TEAM
description: The Student Success Department is responsible for understanding the needs of participants, making sure that they are given appropriate support throughout their hackathon journey. They serve as the student’s primary point of contact, relaying relevant information with regards to the event process, challenge categories and overall student support.

title: OPERATIONS TEAM
description: The Operation Department is responsible for the smooth execution and overall success of all hackathon events. They specifically handle event planning and coordination, logistics, participant engagement and on-site event management.

title: ISSUES MANAGEMENT TEAM
description: The Issue Management Department is proactively involved in monitoring both internal and external factors that could potentially disrupt the smooth progress and quality of hackathon events. The team is committed to identifying and addressing issues promptly, providing support and offering practical solutions to consultants and teams, ultimately boosting the overall hackathon experience.

title: MARKETING TEAM
description: The Marketing Department is the face of Seneca Hackathon. Their role is to drive awareness and engagement across all our digital platforms. They are in-charge of creating captivating content that showcases the hackathon experience, encourage participation, and amplify Seneca Hackathon’s presence on social media.

title: COMMUNICATION TEAM
description: The Communications Department serves as the storyteller of Seneca Hackathon. They develop written content for a wide range of communication channels, including event announcements, blog posts, newsletters, among others. They translate the energy and emotions of the event into compelling narratives to convey the event’s impact and gain engagement.

title: FINANCE TEAM
description: The Finance Department handles the operational budget of the Hackathon, with responsibilities ranging from budget planning and distribution to financial record-keeping and reporting. The team, in close coordination with other departments, meticulously assess expenses and allocate funds for various aspects of the hackathon event.
